# darkText

**Type Property**

The nonadaptable system color for text on a light background.

## Declaration

```swift
class var darkText: UIColor { get }
```

## Return Value

The `UIColor` object.

## Discussion

This color doesn’t adapt to changes in the underlying trait environment.

## Nonadaptable colors

- **lightText**: The nonadaptable system color for text on a dark background.
